title: Contact

content:
Music has been a big part of my life ever since I started playing classical piano at six years old. These days, I am grateful to be mentored by Dr. Shirley Yoo at the Peabody Institute of Johns Hopkins University.
Beyond classical, I have enjoyed producing music for short films, such as the following:
Also, I have had a wonderful time composing and playing live with my friends from Banderlogs. Check out our live session!
title: Music
